com.googlecode.sarasvati.event
Interface ExecutionListener

public interface ExecutionListener

Listeners may be registered for events happening on a single GraphProcess or all processes.

Author:
Paul Lorenz
See Also:
Engine.addExecutionListener(ExecutionListener, ExecutionEventType...), Engine.addExecutionListener(GraphProcess, ExecutionListener, ExecutionEventType...)

Method Summary
 void notify(ExecutionEvent event)
          Invoked by the Engine when an event of a type that this listener has register for occurs.
 

Method Detail

notify

void notify(ExecutionEvent event)
Invoked by the Engine when an event of a type that this listener has register for occurs.

Parameters:
event - The event which has just occurred.
